A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visuals including effects were good. That's it! Thematically\, it flies in the face of the OG Star Wars\, making his Luke's hero's story arc less meaningful.  The plot holes and bad subplots don't make sense. Bad writing and bad humor doesn't help. The supposed hero(Rey) has no hero character development from failure to success. You got a Mary Sue problem thus it's hard to identify with your main protagonist\, making it hard to inspiring\, much less captivated and entertained.
